name: Daisu-Kiss
overview:
Daisu-Kiss is a party video game developed and published by Konami. It was released in March 1996 on arcade platforms in Japan only.

The game consists of several mini-games that need to be cleared in order to receive the affection of a character of the player's choosing. The player can select a character from the 8 character available. Mini-games range from dancing, cooking, scramble, racing among other.
